title: Worlds of IF (May 1968)
creator: Galaxy Publishing Corporation
description: Note: The Guest Editorial "Limiting Factor" by Poul Anderson has been removed from this online copy at the request of the estate of Poul Anderson. M. Melton The Creatures of Man by Howard L. Myers Novella: Where the Subbs Go by C. C. MacApp Serial: The Man in the Maze (Part 2 of 2) by Robert Silverberg Short Stories: Dismal Light by Roger Zelazny Past Touch-the-Sky Mountain by Barry Alan Weissman
